modification.find: <xf:if is="$resource.canUndelete() AND $resource.resource_state == 'deleted'"> <xf:button href="{{ link('resources/undelete', $resource) }}" class="button--link" overlay="true"> {{ phrase('undelete') }} </xf:button> </xf:if>
modification.replace: <xf:if is="$resource.canApproveUnapprove() AND $resource.Ticket"> <xf:button href="{{ link('tickets', $resource.Ticket) }}" class="button--link" overlay="true"> {{ phrase('view_resource_ticket') }} </xf:button> </xf:if> $0
